Open the project in VS Code (macOS example)

1. Install VS Code CLI once (if code isn't recognised):

bash © Copy
2. From your project root (~/excuse-generator):

bash © Copy

VS Code opens the folder with the file tree on the left; double-click excuse_api. py to edit.
